description:
Performs OCR on the selected image file, PDF, JPG, TIF, etc, or in a document through a scanner and shows the results in a browseable message.
Windows+Control+r - Performs OCR to the selected image file
Windows+Control+w - Scans and recognize the document in the scanner

translations.description:
Performs OCR on the selected image file, PDF, JPG, TIF, etc, or in a document through a scanner and shows the results in a browseable message.
Windows+Control+r - Performs OCR to the selected image file
Windows+Control+w - Scans and recognize the document in the scanner

Performs OCR on the selected image file, PDF, JPG, TIF, etc, or in a document through a scanner and shows the results in a browseable message.
Windows+Control+r - Performs OCR to the selected image file
Windows+Control+w - Scans and recognize the document in the scanner

Performs OCR on the selected image file, PDF, JPG, TIF, etc, or in a document through a scanner and shows the results in a browseable message.
Windows+Control+r - Performs OCR to the selected image file
Windows+Control+w - Scans and recognize the document in the scanner

Performs OCR on the selected image file, PDF, JPG, TIF, etc, or in a document through a scanner and shows the results in a browseable message.
Windows+Control+r - Performs OCR to the selected image file
Windows+Control+w - Scans and recognize the document in the scanner

Suorittaa tekstintunnistuksen valitulle kuvatiedostolle (PDF, JPG, TIF, jne.), tai skannerissa olevalle asiakirjalle ja näyttää tulokset erillisessä ikkunassa.
Win+Ctrl+R: Suorittaa tekstintunnistuksen valitulle kuvatiedostolle
Win+Ctrl+W: Skannaa skannerissa olevan asiakirjan ja suorittaa sille tekstintunnistuksen

Performs OCR on the selected image file, PDF, JPG, TIF, etc, or in a document through a scanner and shows the results in a browseable message.
Windows+Control+r - Performs OCR to the selected image file
Windows+Control+w - Scans and recognize the document in the scanner

Permite executar OCR ao arquivo de imagem selecionado, PDF, JPG, TIF, etc, ou a um documento através de um scanner e exibe os resultados numa mensagem navegável.
Windows+Control+r - Executa o OCR ao arquivo de imagem selecionado
Windows+Control+w - Digitaliza e reconhece o documento no scanner

Permite executar OCR a um ficheiro de imagem seleccionado, PDF, JPG, TIF, etc, ou a um documento através de um scanner e mostra os resultados numa mensagem navegável.
Windows+Control+r - Executa o OCR ao ficheiro de imagem seleccionado
Windows+Control+w - Digitaliza e reconhece o documento no scanner

Performs OCR on the selected image file, PDF, JPG, TIF, etc, or in a document through a scanner and shows the results in a browseable message.
Windows+Control+r - Performs OCR to the selected image file
Windows+Control+w - Scans and recognize the document in the scanner

Seçilen görüntü dosyası, PDF, JPG, TIF, vb. üzerinde veya bir tarayıcı aracılığıyla bir belgede OCR gerçekleştirir ve sonuçları göz atılabilir bir iletişim kutusunda gösterir
Windows+Control+r - Seçilen görüntü dosyasına OCR uygular
Windows+Control+Shift+r - Tarayıcıdaki belgeyi tarar ve tanır

Виконує розпізнавання вибраного файлу зображення, PDF, JPG, TIF тощо, або документа, отриманого за допомогою сканера, і показує результати у вигляді повідомлення, яке можна переглянути.
Windows+Керування+r - виконує розпізнавання вибраного файлу зображення
Windows+Керування+w - сканує та розпізнає документ у сканері
